entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
